Issue.summary: Ensure that the stateDB is dropped after reset/rollback
Issue.description: Currently, the peer node reset/rollback command itself take care of dropping the statelevelDB. However, the couchDB should be removed manually. As an admin could do a mistake by not removing the couchDB, we need to add necessary check in the code to ensure that the stateDB is dropped after a reset/rollback.
